list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I thought I should never see you again.

list_definition.mean_english: diễn tả cái gì phải, nên xảy ra hoặc được làm
list_definition.definition: used to state that something ought to happen, be done etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You should hold your knife in your right hand

list_definition.mean_english: diễn tả cái gì có thể xảy ra
list_definition.definition: used to state that something is likely to happen etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If you leave now, you should arrive there by six o’clock.

list_definition.mean_english: dùng sau sự biểu thị ngạc nhiên hay đau khổ
list_definition.definition: used after certain expressions of sorrow, surprise etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m surprised you should think that.

list_definition.mean_english: dùng sau“if” diễn tả một điều kiện
list_definition.definition: used after if to state a condition

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: If anything should happen to me, I want you to remember everything I have told you today.

list_definition.mean_english: diễn tả ước muốn khả thi của ai đó
list_definition.definition: (with Ior we) used to state that a person wishes something was possible

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I should love to go to France (if only I had enough money).

list_definition.mean_english: diễn tả một sự kiện khá gây ngạc nhiên
list_definition.definition: used to refer to an event etc which is rather surprising

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I was just about to get on the bus when who should come along but John, the very person I was going to visit.
